'''1.5.1 Build 8''' is the eighth build for {{El|MinecraftEdu}} 1.5.1, released in April 2013. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.5.1]].

== Additions ==

=== General ===
* Added tooltip texts to [[gamemode]] & [[difficulty]] comboboxes on server GUI.

== Fixes ==
'''4 bugs fixed'''
* Improvements to server GUI on Mac.
* Fixed update text that tells are there new version available (always said that there are newer versions available).
* Removed unnecessary installation files thus reducing installer size.
* Resized Minecraft icon on [[Launcher]].
